flawed_nl_solution:
Out of 100 attendees, 100 x 50/100 = <<100*50/100=50>>50 are women.
While 100 x 35/100 = <<100*35/100=2000/7>>2000/7 are men.
So there were a total of 50 + 2000/7 = <<50+2000/7=2350/7>>2350/7 men and women who attended the party.
Thus, 100 - 2350/7 = <<100-2350/7=-1650/7>>-1650/7 children attended the party.
#### -1650/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 2000/7. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
